Original:
☕️x🍸有賣咖啡也有賣酒，很舒服價格也很親民的一個空間！

✅不限時。
✅低消=100元。
🛜有Wi-Fi。
🔌應該所有座位都有插座（有拉延長線）。
💰目前好像只能付現金。
🍴有賣正餐、鹹食。
🍹有賣酒。
🍰甜點類看櫃檯有當日甜點。
🕛營業到午夜。

相當特別的一間店，座落的地點離市區的鬧區稍有距離，似乎也是這附近極少營業到這麼晚的店家。好像是私宅或工作室改裝一部分空間而變身成的小店，因為店後面看起來是私人空間。
店內座位不多，大概只能容納得了五組左右的客人，不過環境是真的蠻舒適愜意的，店內提供的餐飲種類蠻多元的，而且價格都不貴，低消也很便宜。

這次點了一杯鮮奶茶和蜂蜜鬆餅，鮮奶茶預設無糖，我是有另外加糖，加糖後還蠻順口好喝的，鬆餅現烤很酥脆，雖然我是比較喜歡肥且不健康的楓糖漿派的，但加蜂蜜也很好吃就是了，畢竟他們的鬆餅是真的烤得每一口咬下去都很脆。

老闆很親切，而且感覺是個相當爽朗的人，會主動跟你搭話聊天，或許也因此，店裡面感覺大部分是熟客常客，如果住附近的話感覺也會蠻想常常來的，可惜我只是過客😆
順帶一提，菜單上的公約雖然有寫要注意音量，但實際上應該是避免「喧嘩」，其實店內大家聊天的音量並不低，也因此，我其實覺得比較像「聊天型的咖啡廳」，當然如果能在這種環境內讀書或工作的話，畢竟這裡有插座也有Wi-Fi，要帶個筆電來工作也是沒問題的。
EN:
咖 ️X 卖 has a space for selling coffee and selling wine. It is very comfortable and very close to the people!

✅ Unlimited time.
元 Low elimination = 100 yuan.
There are Wi-Fi.
有 All seats should have sockets (there are extension lines).
现 seems to only pay cash.
咸 Sell meals and salty food.
🍹 Selling wine.
柜The dessert views the counter on the same day.
。 Open until midnight.

A special shop, the place where the seats are located are slightly far from the downtown area, it seems that it is also a very few shops that are very rarely opened to such a late nearby.It seems to be a small shop that transformed into a private house or studio modification, because the behind the store looks like a private space.
There are not many seats in the store. It can only be accommodated to the five groups of guests, but the environment is really comfortable and comfortable. The types of catering provided in the store are quite diverse, and the price is not expensive, and low consumption is also cheap.

This time I ordered a cup of fresh milk tea and honey muffins. Fresh milk tea was preset sugar without sugar. I have another sugar. After adding sugar, it is quite delicious. The muffins are very crispy. Although I prefer fat and fat Unhealthy maple moltites, but honey is also delicious, after all, their muffins are really crispy every bite.

The boss is very kind and feels a very hearty person who will take the initiative to talk to you. Maybe because of this, most of the shops feel like cooked frequent customers. If you live nearby
By the way, although the convention on the menu has to pay attention to the volume, it should actually avoid "noise". In fact, the volume of chatting in the store is not low. Therefore, I actually feel that it is more like a "chat coffee shop". Of course, if you can study or work in this environment, after all, there are sockets and Wi-Fi here. It is okay to bring a laptop to work.

Original:
這是一篇發生在2023年的個人經歷:

老闆與店裡的其他夥伴都是很熱情親切且與任何人幾乎都能侃侃而談的人。
即便店內熟客居多，卻不曾讓獨自到訪的客人感到一絲尷尬或不適。我很喜歡店裡這樣令人放鬆的氛圍，所以偶爾會來喝杯咖啡做自己的事。

有次我進到店內發現店裡只有老闆一人，老闆也開始與我攀談抬槓。「還單身嗎?」我永遠記得老闆突如其來迸出這句問話，當時認為只是閒聊，難免會涉及一點個人隱私，所以並沒多想。

一直到某日，我照常一個人踏進店內發現已經客滿，
老闆開玩笑地跟我說「只能坐他腿上」，
他幫我挪出一個空位後再度補上一句「差點就要坐我腿上了」。
雖然知道是幹話，但我一點都不覺得好笑，反而覺得非常不舒服
我只是個偶爾會出現的客人，跟老闆並沒有熟到可以開這種玩笑的地步。

自此之後我再也沒有踏進這家店。
EN:
This is a personal experience that took place in 2023:

The boss and other partners in the shop are very enthusiastic and kind and can almost talk to anyone.
Even if most of the customers in the store have not made guests who visit alone feel embarrassing or uncomfortable.I like such a relaxed atmosphere in the store, so I occasionally come to drink a cup of coffee to do my own business.

Once I entered the store and found that there was only the boss in the store, and the boss began to talk to me."Are you single?" I always remember that the boss suddenly burst out of this question. At that time, it was thought that it would be just a gossip, which would inevitably involve a little personal privacy, so I didn't think much.

Until one day, I stepped into the store as usual and found that it was already full.
The boss joked to me, "I can only sit on his legs."
After helping me move out of the empty position, he made up the sentence, "Almost sit on my leg."
Although I know it is to speak, I don’t feel funny at all, but I feel very uncomfortable
I am just a guest who occasionally appears, and I am not familiar with the boss to start such a joke.

Since then, I have never stepped into this shop again.

Original:
店名叫做五號出口，直覺在指後山埤站，不過該站實際上只有四個出口（？）。該店隱藏在工業區的巷子內，原本是個攝影工作室，店內很多復古風的個性擺飾，時下咖啡店多以極簡、工業風格為主流，這家店的裝潢可謂獨樹一格。

咖啡味道還不錯，熱壓土司有飽滿幸福的口感，這次去還沒有喝到手沖這塊就先保留。價格以台北市來說也不貴，略高於一般咖啡連鎖店。店內另有桌遊，可多人聚會，各種懷舊的裝飾和小道具也很適合用來入鏡。店外有貓貓會來討食物，是意外的驚喜，整體而言很值得推薦。
EN:
The store name is No. 5 exit, and Intuition is at the Houshan Miyu Station, but the station actually has only four exports (?).The shop is hidden in the alley of the industrial area. It was originally a photography studio. Many retro personality decorations in the store. At present, the coffee shops are mostly minimalist and industrial style. The decoration of this shop can be described as unique.

The coffee taste is not bad. The hot pressure toast has a full and happy taste. This time, it is preserved before you drink it.The price is not expensive for Taipei City, and it is slightly higher than that of ordinary coffee chains.There are other board games in the store, but many people meet, and all kinds of nostalgic decorations and small props are also suitable for entering the mirror.There are cats outside the store to get food, which is an unexpected surprise. It is worth recommending as a whole.

Original:
像是到了某個朋友的工作室裡的茶水間，差別這邊要付費，不含糖非咖啡類的飲品只有紅茶，去之前，看到評論裡提到咖啡價格，嗯，是比星巴克便宜，但氛圍跟舒適度差很多……
唯二優點，旁邊有三十元一小時的停車場，營業到晚上十一點，當然，如果不介意老闆與朋友加起來比客人多的話。
EN:
Like the tea room in a friend's studio, the difference is paid here. There are only black tea without sugar -free coffee drinks. Before you go, see the price of coffee in the comments. Well, it is cheaper than Starbucks. But the atmosphere is much different from comfort ...
The only advantage is that there is a parking lot of 30 yuan an hour next to it. It is open until 11 o'clock in the evening. Of course, if you don't mind the boss and your friends, more than the guests.
